titleStmt.title: The Thracian wonder a comical history as it hath been several times acted with great applause / written by John VVebster and VVilliam Rowley.
titleStmt.author: Webster, John, 1580?-1625?
Rowley, William, 1585?-1642?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Johnson and are to be sold by Francis Kirkman ...,

notesStmt.note: It is improbable that either Webster or Rowley wrote any of this play, despite the ascription on the t.p. Cf. DNB.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
